Welcome to Silicon Valley!

The Valley of Heart's Delight.

Location

Silicon Valley located at a southern portion of the San Francisco Bay Area , California - U.S..

Entrepreneurship

Silicon Valley became a global synonym for leading high-tech enterprises, and Entrepreneurship programs such as 500 Startups.

Employment

Tech workers can command high salaries and have a lot of freedom .
